item.title: 又一个 binlog 解析器 -- Yet Another Binlog Parser
item.description: Although the article was originally written in Chinese, with the help of ChatGPT, I was able to provide an English translation. If you want to read the English version, please jump to here for reading. 为什么要再造一个轮子？ 造轮子是程序员的浪漫！🥰 在前东家工作的时候，我设
